revision.text:
<!--사찰_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping 
| mapToClass = HistoricBuilding 
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 절 이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
   	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 소재지 | ontologyProperty = country }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 소재지 | ontologyProperty = locatedInArea }}
    	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 별칭 | ontologyProperty = foaf:nick }}


end}}
